message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 65-35 split is more fair.  What do you say?
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is a good middle ground.
I'm willing to give up some of my potential gains to come to a fair agreement. Let's split it 60-40.
Come on, Bob, meet me halfway! 56-44 is a fair compromise.
This is my final offer.  It's the best deal I can offer given the inflation.  If we don't come to an agreement, we both lose out.
